snippet: Thomas Quasthoff, announcing his retirement, says his health no longer lets him live up to his high standard.
abstract: Thomas Quasthoff, announcing his retirement, says his health no longer lets him live up to his high standard.
lead_paragraph: Thomas Quasthoff, 52, the celebrated German bass-baritone renowned for his sensitive, expressive performances and deep artistic intelligence, says he is retiring from the concert stage.

headline.main: Thomas Quasthoff, Celebrated Bass-Baritone, Is Retiring From Performing
